# Alita Document

**Alita - Web Studio WordPress Theme**

![screenshot](./img/screenshot.avif)

Alita is a stylish, responsive and easy-to-use Business WordPress Theme best suited for contemporary web design studios and creative agencies, web designerâ€™s portfolios, and advertising firms, digital & graphic design, website building.
